name: Harvia Technology
overview:
Harvia Technologies is a software consulting firm based in India which focuses on providing innovative and cost efficient solutions to end customers. We focus on very specific areas of expertise in order to provide better solutions to our customers.

Our areas of expertise include:

v Website Designing and Branding

v Content Management Systems using Joomla / Drupal / Wordpress.

v Social Media Networking website development.

v IPhone Application Development.

v Face book and Twitter Application development

v Ecommerce application on online shopping.
